an5.44:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
an5.44:4.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena uggassa gahapatino vesālikassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an5.44:4.4: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesāliko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.44:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho uggo gahapati vesāliko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.44:5.1: “Sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an5.44:5.3: Manāpaṃ me, bhante, sālapupphakaṃ khādanīyaṃ;
an5.44:5.4: taṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:6.1: “Sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an5.44:6.3: Manāpaṃ me, bhante, sampannakolakaṃ sūkaramaṃsaṃ;
an5.44:6.4: taṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:7.1: “Sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an5.44:7.3: Manāpaṃ me, bhante, nibbattatelakaṃ nāliyasākaṃ;
an5.44:7.4: taṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:8.1: “Sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an5.44:8.3: Manāpo me, bhante, sālīnaṃ odano vicitakāḷako anekasūpo anekabyañjano;
an5.44:8.4: taṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:9.1: “Sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an5.44:9.4: tāni me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:10.1: “Sammukhā metaṃ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
an5.44:10.3: Manāpo me, bhante, pallaṅko gonakatthato paṭalikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇo sauttaracchado ubhatolohitakūpadhāno.
an5.44:10.6: Idaṃ me, bhante, candanaphalakaṃ agghati adhikasatasahassaṃ;
an5.44:10.7: taṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:10.9: Atha kho bhagavā uggaṃ gahapatiṃ vesālikaṃ iminā anumodanīyena anumodi:
an5.44:11.2: Yo ujjubhūtesu dadāti chandasā;
an5.44:11.3: Acchādanaṃ sayanamannapānaṃ,
an5.44:13.1: Atha kho bhagavā uggaṃ gahapatiṃ vesālikaṃ iminā anumodanīyena anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an5.44:14.1: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesāliko aparena samayena kālamakāsi.
an5.44:14.2: Kālaṅkato ca uggo gahapati vesāliko aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapajji.
an5.44:14.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an5.44:14.4: Atha kho uggo devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.44:14.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho uggaṃ devaputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an5.44:14.9: Atha kho bhagavā uggaṃ devaputtaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
